references.paper_title: Stable video diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets.
references.reason: This paper is a state-of-the-art work in video diffusion models that the current work builds upon and improves.
This paper is foundational in establishing video diffusion models as a core methodology that the current work directly addresses and improves upon.

references.paper_title: Animatediff: Animate your personalized text-to-image diffusion models without specific tuning.
references.reason: This paper introduces a specific model (Animatediff) that the current work uses for experimental comparison and demonstrates improvements over.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models.
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the image diffusion models which are frequently leveraged as base models for video diffusion, which is central to the current work.
This paper introduces a key technique (Genie) that the current work uses to improve the efficiency of video diffusion models.
